H0.text: Control is the term for the participants who received a sugar pill, the half of the participants in the drug company’s study testing a pill to reduce cases of stomach virus.

H1.text: Experimental participants are the half of the participants who received a sugar pill in the drug company’s trial to reduce cases of stomach virus.

H2.text: The dependent variable is the half of the participants who received a sugar pill in the drug company's study testing a new medicine to reduce cases of stomach virus.

H3.text: Independent variable is the participants who received the sugar pill in the drug company’s study that tested a pill to reduce cases of stomach virus, with half of the participants given the active medication and the other half given a sugar pill.

A4.text: Common placebos include inert tablets (like sugar pills)

A5.text: Some suggest that existing medical treatments should be used instead of placebos, to avoid having some patients not receive medicine during the trial.

A6.text: Subjects are assigned randomly without informing them to which group they belonged.

A7.text: Many trials are doubled-blinded so that researchers do not know to which group a subject is assigned.

A8.text: Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials (CENTRAL) is a concentrated source for bibliographic reports of randomized controlled trials.

A9.text: The placebo drug group (P): who receive a placebo drug that simulates the active drug.

A10.text: The Active drug group (A): who receive the active test drug.

A11.text: James Lind Library A source of historical texts on fair tests of treatments in health care.

A12.text: The sample or group receiving the drug would be the experimental group (treatment group); and the one receiving the placebo or regular treatment would be the control one.

A13.text: In some disciplines (e.g., psychology or political science), a 'true experiment' is a method of social research in which there are two kinds of variables. The independent variable is manipulated by the experimenter, and the dependent variable is measured.
